title: No sounds with using FullTrustProcessLauncher
body: I saw new post, and I confirmed that the problem was fixed following URL.

comments.body: @Fireflower, can you send me an email, crutkas@microsoft.com?
I hope I could. But it happens in large size product. I think it's hard to pick up a part of it... If I have enough time, I'll try to code sample source...
